channel.title: How to add Donator status with crown?
channel.description: I wanna make a donator status thing for my server with the crown im using allstar scape v2 Please help thanks. If u can give me a code and ill copy and paste it whereveer :D

item.title: How to add Donator status with crown?
item.dc:creator: @IsolatioN IsolatioN
item.description:
@IsolatioN wrote:

The crown is loaded client sided which is too hard to explain without doing a complete tutorial. As for a donator status server side. You can do something like public boolean playerDonator = false;make it save and anywhere it would be needed you can do like if (c.isPlayerDonator) { whatever u want to happen } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to use this feature."); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to add Donator status with crown?
